name: The suicidal adventure of Squish (32bit)
description: Here comes a little platformer made by a group of students in their first year in a digital and creative school. The game was made during the 43th Ludum Dare in only 48 hours. You play as a little fluffy ball of fur also called a “Squish” and you must reach the end of the level to save the princess Squish. To do so, you can sacrifice a fistful of poor creatures to progress through the traps placed throughout the game.
